company_legal_names: gem spright electricals & automation pvt. ltd.
short_description: gem spright is an electric supplies & power generation supplier based in india.
long_description: gem spright is an established industrial automation and control system solutions company. with over 20 years of experience, we are a professionally managed organization of over a 135 employees. we partner with clients spread across the world, ranging from mid-sized companies to mncs from oems to end users. our engineers are well equipped to execute customized integration needs across a wide range of technologies. our customised automation solutions deliver superior value throughout the lifecycle of a plant. our factory automation systems are designed to meet the latest industrial automation standards. we manage inventory of about 20 best-in-class categories. looking for the best automation solution for your company. with over 4 years of experience and a turnover of over rs. 30 million, we are a professionally managed organization. we are pleased to introduce ourselves as a professional group organization engaged as a manufacturer & supplier of electrical control panels required for hvac, engineering, power distribution and process industries.
